summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road approaching an intersection with traffic lights. A black SUV on the left side suddenly accelerates and cuts into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential collision risk.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The black SUV on the left side suddenly accelerates and cuts into the self-vehicles lane, forcing the self-vehicle to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black SUV, approximately 2 meters away, accelerating and cutting into the self-vehicles lane.
